upgrade.0: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
upgrade.1: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 7% more DMG and take 2.7% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
upgrade.2: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 8% more DMG and take 2.4% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
upgrade.3: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 9% more DMG and take 2.2% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
upgrade.4: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 10% more DMG and take 2% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

upgrade.0: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升6%造成的伤害，3%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。

upgrade.3: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升9%造成的伤害，2.2%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。
upgrade.4: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升10%造成的伤害，2%受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。

upgrade.0: フィールドにいる時、4秒毎に、与えるダメージ+6%、被ダメージ+3%。最大5重まで、退場後もリセットされず、攻撃を受けると効果数-1。
